name: Age of Space: Colonization
detailed_description:
“One small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind”

Face the challenges of conquering space in Age of Space: Colonization. Become the head of a huge corporation in a unique tycoon-style game and learn the secrets of the greatest minds on our planet working towards freeing mankind from the confines of Earth.

A UNIQUE TYCOON-STYLE GAME


Age of Space is a one-of-a-kind economic simulator where you act as the head of a cutting-edge corporation specializing in aerospace technology. Your goal is the optimal management of the different arms of the company in order to ultimately conquer the cosmos.

As the head of the company, make a wide array of key decisions involving the development of aerospace technology, training the team, and various scientific research projects – all problems that Elon Musk and others like him have to face on a daily basis.

Age of Space is the only simulator of its kind on the market. The game mechanics deeply reflect the many different aspects of the challenges of space exploration in a way that no other computer game has done before.

FIGHT FOR MARKET DOMINANCE


Conquering space is a race in which you’ll have to face other fast-developing corporations. Show that you’re more effective by winning the financial and technological battle for dominance over the heavens.

CREATED BY SPACE-LOVERS, FOR SPACE-LOVERS


Age of Space is a game created by a team of people passionate about space travel. The game is the result of hundreds of hours of painstaking research performed by members of the team, whose goal was to include every aspect of effective expansion into space.

The realistic, richly detailed graphics will provide you with an unheard-of visual experience for this game genre. Age of Space will let you fully experience the cosmic future that is waiting just around the corner!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660

Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1)
  • Processor: AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
